messages.messageBody:
This is a very belated thank-you to all those kind souls who responded
to my request for HELP. I had solicited advice and opinion regarding my
daughter's ongoing and seemingly benign cramps of the gut. Though I am
aware that there don't seem to be solid answers to our problem, it is
very encouraging to hear others have been through it, no worse for wear.
Thanks for all the support! I really appreciate knowing there's some
place to turn when you think you've exhausted all other venues...

Thanks EVERYBODY who came to my rescue!
